workflow.name: Daily currency rates email report with USD‚ÜíEUR/NGN & BTC/ETH price tracking
workflow.description:
# üí∞ Track Daily Fiat & Crypto Exchange Rates Report with ExchangeRate-API & CoinGecko
A simple, reliable workflow that emails you a **beautiful HTML currency report** every morning at **8:00 AM** (your n8n server‚Äôs timezone).  
It pulls **USD‚ÜíEUR** and **USD‚ÜíNGN** fiat rates and **BTC/ETH** prices (+ 24h % change), then formats a clean HTML email.

---


## üìå What It Does

- ‚è∞ **Schedule:** Runs daily at 8:00 AM  
- üåç **Fiat Rates:** USD‚ÜíEUR and USD‚ÜíNGN (via ExchangeRate-API, no key needed)  
- ‚Çø **Crypto:** BTC & ETH prices + 24h change (via CoinGecko, no key needed)  
- ‚úâÔ∏è **Email:** Sends a **mobile-friendly HTML** + plain text fallback

---

## üó∫Ô∏è Node Map (At a Glance)

| # | Node Name | Type | Purpose |
|---|-----------|------|---------|
| 1 | **Daily 8AM Trigger** | `Schedule Trigger` | Fires every day at 08:00 |
| 2 | **Get Fiat Exchange Rates** | `HTTP Request` | `https://api.exchangerate-api.com/v4/latest/USD` |
| 3 | **Get Crypto Prices** | `HTTP Request` | CoinGecko simple price endpoint |
| 4 | **Merge** | `Merge` | Combines fiat + crypto responses |
| 5 | **Format Email Content** | `Code (v2)` | Builds HTML + text, sets subject & summary |
| 6 | **Send Daily Currency Email** | `Email Send` | Sends the HTML email via SMTP |

> üìù Sticky Notes in the canvas explain each section. They‚Äôre optional and safe to delete.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Required Setup

### 1) Schedule Time
- Open **Daily 8AM Trigger** ‚Üí set cron to **08:00 daily**.  
  Suggested cron: `0 8 * * *` (server local time; if you‚Äôre in Lagos, ensure server timezone matches **Africa/Lagos** or adjust accordingly).

### 2) SMTP Credentials
- Open **Send Daily Currency Email** ‚Üí set:
  - **From Email**: your sender (e.g. `your-email@gmail.com`)  
  - **To Email**: recipient address  
  - **Credentials**: select your SMTP account  
- **Gmail tip:** use **App Passwords** (with 2FA enabled).  
  - Server: `smtp.gmail.com`  
  - Port: `587` (STARTTLS) or `465` (SSL)  
  - Auth: your full Gmail address + app password

### 3) API Access
- Both endpoints are **free** & **no API key**:
  - Fiat (USD base): `https://api.exchangerate-api.com/v4/latest/USD`  
  - Crypto (BTC/ETH): `https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/simple/price?ids=bitcoin,ethereum&vs_currencies=usd&include_24hr_change=true`

---

## üß© Input Order

The **Format Email Content** node is written to **auto-detect** which input is fiat vs crypto, so the Merge order doesn‚Äôt matter. A clean pattern is:

- **Get Crypto Prices** ‚Üí **Merge** (Input 1)  
- **Get Fiat Exchange Rates** ‚Üí **Merge** (Input 2)  
- **Merge** ‚Üí **Format Email Content** ‚Üí **Send Daily Currency Email**

---

## üöÄ Test It Quickly

1. Run **Get Fiat Exchange Rates** ‚Üí verify `rates.EUR` and `rates.NGN` exist.  
2. Run **Get Crypto Prices** ‚Üí verify BTC/ETH `usd` and `usd_24h_change`.  
3. Run **Format Email Content** ‚Üí check it outputs `subject`, `html`, `text`.  
4. Run **Send Daily Currency Email** ‚Üí confirm the styled report arrives.

---

## üéõ Customize

- **Currencies:** Add more fiat codes from `rates` (e.g., GBP, ZAR) and extend the HTML template.  
- **Coins:** Add `ids=` in CoinGecko (e.g., `bitcoin,ethereum,solana`) and render extra cards.  
- **Send time:** Adjust the cron (e.g., `30 7 * * *` for 7:30 AM).  
- **Branding:** Edit colors, fonts, and header gradient in the HTML string.  
- **Timezone stamp:** Change the display timezone inside the Code node if needed.

---

## üß© Common Pitfalls & Fixes

- **Email not styled:** Ensure the Email node is set to **HTML** format.  
- **Gmail auth fails:** Use an **App Password** and port **587** with STARTTLS.  
- **Empty values:** Run the two HTTP nodes once and confirm the responses contain data.  
- **Rate limits:** If you increase frequency, consider adding a short Wait node or caching.

parameters.content:
üí∞ CURRENCY TRACKER WORKFLOW:
Get daily exchange rates delivered to your email every morning at 8 AM.

üìä CURRENCIES TRACKED:
‚Ä¢ USD to EUR
‚Ä¢ USD to NGN (Nigerian Naira)
‚Ä¢ Bitcoin (BTC) to USD
‚Ä¢ Ethereum (ETH) to USD

üìß DELIVERY:
‚Ä¢ Professional HTML email
‚Ä¢ Sent daily at 8:00 AM
‚Ä¢ Includes percentage changes
‚Ä¢ Mobile-friendly format

üåç FIAT CURRENCY RATES:
Fetches USD exchange rates from a free API.

üì° API Used: ExchangeRate-API
‚Ä¢ Free, no signup required
‚Ä¢ Updates multiple times daily
‚Ä¢ Reliable and fast

üí± Returns rates for:
‚Ä¢ EUR (Euro)
‚Ä¢ NGN (Nigerian Naira)
‚Ä¢ 168+ other currencies

üîß No configuration needed - just works!

‚Çø CRYPTOCURRENCY PRICES:
Fetches Bitcoin and Ethereum prices from CoinGecko.

üì° API Used: CoinGecko
‚Ä¢ Free, reliable crypto data
‚Ä¢ Includes 24hr price changes
‚Ä¢ No API key required

üí∞ Returns:
‚Ä¢ Bitcoin (BTC) price in USD
‚Ä¢ Ethereum (ETH) price in USD
‚Ä¢ 24-hour percentage change
‚Ä¢ Real-time market data

üé® EMAIL FORMATTING:
This JavaScript code creates a beautiful HTML email with all currency data.

‚ú® Features:
‚Ä¢ Professional design with gradients
‚Ä¢ Mobile-responsive layout
‚Ä¢ Color-coded price changes (green/red)
‚Ä¢ Proper number formatting
‚Ä¢ Both HTML and plain text versions

üìß Email Contains:
‚Ä¢ Daily date in subject line
‚Ä¢ Fiat rates: USD‚ÜíEUR, USD‚ÜíNGN
‚Ä¢ Crypto prices: BTC, ETH with 24hr changes
‚Ä¢ Professional footer with timestamps

üì® EMAIL DELIVERY:
Sends your beautiful currency report via email.

üîß SETUP REQUIRED:
1. Change 'your-email@gmail.com' to your sender email
2. Change 'recipient@email.com' to where you want the report sent
3. Configure SMTP credentials (Gmail, Outlook, etc.)

üìß GMAIL SETUP:
‚Ä¢ SMTP Server: smtp.gmail.com
‚Ä¢ Port: 587
‚Ä¢ Use App Password (not regular password)

‚úÖ Ready to receive daily currency updates at 8 AM!
